snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin said some of Russia’s partners in Syria had “mush for brains” for failing to go along with all that Russia wanted to do.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin scores United States and others for what he terms their lack of cooperation with Russian military intervention in Syria; says they have 'mush for brains;' Russia is being criticized for attacking Syrian rebels but not Islamic State.

byline.contributor: Anne Barnard contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon, and Helene Cooper from Washington.

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin said some of Russia’s partners in Syria had “mush for brains” for failing to go along with all that Russia wanted to do.

headline.main: Putin Says U.S. Fails to Cooperate in Syria
headline.print_headline: Putin, Lashing Out, Says U.S. Fails to Cooperate in Syria

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
